xml.p: Introduction: "Ahoy there! It's nice to see young folk movin' in to the valley. It's not very common these days." #!String

accept_869: "Ah... That's the perfect bait for a catfish I've been tryin' to catch!#$b#Here, let me trade you this for it. I'm not sure what it is, but it washed up on the beach not too long ago.#$b#Somethin' tells me you could use it, lad.^Somethin' tells me you could use it, miss." #!String

FullCrabPond: "*sniff*... Ah... That old familiar scent. You've been raisin' crabs, haven't ya?#$b#Yer a man after me own heart, @. Hah!$h^Yer a lady after me own heart, @. Hah!$h#$b#Here, take this. I found it on the beach... Been savin' it fer a special occasion. It's not every day I discover a fellow crab enthusiast! [797]" #!String
MovieInvitation: "Ah... a movie. That's kind of ye, lad.^Ah... a movie. That's kind of ye, miss.#$b#I'll just finish me pipe, and head over." #!String
Mon: "Ahoy there, son.^Ahoy there, lass.#$b#Looks like decent weather for fishing, eh?" #!String
Mon4: "Have you had much luck in the local waters? You look like you could be a strong angler if you set your mind to it." #!String
Tue: "A true angler has respect for the water... don't you forget that." #!String

Tue6: "The ol' Man was a fisherman, you know. I grew up sailing between the fern islands, living from catch to catch.#$e#The fishing life is tough, but there's something about it that keeps you goin'." #!String
Wed: "Some fish come and go with the seasons. Others only come out at night or in the rain." #!String
Thu: "*mumble* *mumble* ...Eh? I would tell you about my thoughts, but it's a fisherman's secret." #!String

Thu2: "There's rumors of some very rare fish in these parts... but only an experienced angler could stand a chance against them.#$e#You'll need the finest bait you can get if you want a rare fish to bite." #!String
Fri: "If you really want to get the fish biting, make sure you put some bait on your hook." #!String
Sat: "If the local fishing scene got a bit more lively, I might expand the shop's stock." #!String
Sat8: "How's the fishing life going for ya?#$e#I try to fish as often as possible, but it's not easy when you've got a shop to run." #!String

Sun: "If you purchase a high quality fishing rod, you'll be able to attach bait and tackle to the line.#$b#Bait causes fish to bite faster. Tackle can make your job a lot easier when reeling fish in.#$e#There's all kinds of tackle, with different perks. They're usually a little flimsy, so don't be surprised if your tackle breaks after a while." #!String
Sun10: "Hey, it's my skipper, @!$h#$e#I'd give you a discount on bait if I could afford it.$s" #!String
